mapper.select: select empId, empPass, empName, empPhoto, empBirth, empPhone, empTel, empEmail , empAddress, empStatus, departmentName, empPosition, empHiredate, empLeavedate, empRetiredate from employees where empId = #{empId}
mapper.insert: insert into employees (empPass, empName, empPhoto, empBirth, empPhone, empTel, empEmail, empAddress, departmentName, empPosition, empHiredate, empRole) values (#{empPass}, #{empName}, #{empPhoto}, #{empBirth}, #{empPhone}, #{empTel}, #{empEmail}, #{empAddress}, #{departmentName}, #{empPosition}, #{empHiredate}, #{empRole})
